properties.entry: SELECT srp.*, sgi.QUANTITY AS WAREHOUSE_QUANTITY, sgi.TYPE as WH_TYPE FROM sc_real_product srp , sc_goods_inventory sgi WHERE srp.id = sgi.GOODS_ID AND sgi.WAREHOUSE_ID = '{@#sourceWarehouseId#}'

select * from ( SELECT s1.* , (SELECT NAME FROM sc_warehouse s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.warehouse_id) AS WAREHOUSE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_user s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.charger) AS CHARGER_NAME, (select CREATE_TIME from sc_warehouse_in_track st where st.in_id = s1.id and st.status = 70 limit 0,1) as IN_TIME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sc_warehouse_box_product s2 , sc_warehouse_box s3 WHERE s2.box_id = s3.id AND s3.in_id = s1.id AND ( s2.status IS NULL OR s2.status !=1 ) ) AS STATUS1 FROM sc_warehouse_in s1 where 1=1 and s1.type = 'in' {@ and s1.IN_NUMBER like '%#inNumber#%'} {@ and s1.status = '#status#'} ) t order by t.IN_TIME desc
SELECT s1.* FROM sc_warehouse_in s1 where s1.id = '{@#id#}'

SELECT s1.* , (SELECT NAME FROM sc_warehouse s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.warehouse_id) AS WAREHOUSE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM sc_user s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.charger) AS CHARGER_NAME FROM sc_warehouse_in s1 where 1=1 and s1.id = '{@#id#}'

UPDATE sc_warehouse_in SET IN_NUMBER = '{@#inNumber#}' , CHARGER = '{@#charger#}' , WAREHOUSE_ID = '{@#warehouseId#}' , SHIP_COMPANY = '{@#shipCompany#}' , OUT_TARGET='{@#outTarget#}', SHIP_TYPE = '{@#shipType#}' , SHIP_NO = '{@#shipNo#}' , SHIP_TRACKNUMBER = '{@#shipTracknumber#}' , SHIP_DATE = '{@#shipDate#}' , ARRIVAL_PORT = '{@#arrivalPort#}' , PLAN_ARRIVAL_DATE = '{@#planArrivalDate#}' , {@REAL_ARRIVAL_DATE = '#realArrivalDate#' , } {@flow_type = '#flowType#' , } {@IN_SOURCE_TYPE = '#inSourceType#' , } {@SOURCE_WAREHOUSE_ID = '#sourceWarehouseId#' , } MEMO = '{@#memo#}' , {@ TYPE = '#type#' ,} UPDATOR = '{@#loginId#}' , UPDATE_TIME = NOW(), send_company = '{@#sendCompany#}' , send_company_address = '{@#sendCompanyAddress#}' , send_company_post = '{@#sendCompanyPost#}' , send_company_country = '{@#sendCompanyCountry#}' , send_company_contactor = '{@#sendCompanyContactor#}' , send_company_phone = '{@#sendCompanyPhone#}' , send_company_email = '{@#sendCompanyEmail#}' , receive_company = '{@#receiveCompany#}' , receive_company_address = '{@#receiveCompanyAddress#}' , receive_company_post = '{@#receiveCompanyPost#}' , receive_company_country = '{@#receiveCompanyCountry#}' , receive_company_contactor = '{@#receiveCompanyContactor#}' , receive_company_phone = '{@#receiveCompanyPhone#}' , receive_company_email = '{@#receiveCompanyEmail#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'

INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_in ( IN_NUMBER, CHARGER, WAREHOUSE_ID, OUT_TARGET, SHIP_COMPANY, SHIP_TYPE, SHIP_NO, SHIP_TRACKNUMBER, ARRIVAL_PORT, SHIP_DATE, PLAN_ARRIVAL_DATE, MEMO, TYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, SEND_COMPANY, SEND_COMPANY_ADDRESS, SEND_COMPANY_POST, SEND_COMPANY_COUNTRY, SEND_COMPANY_CONTACTOR, SEND_COMPANY_PHONE, SEND_COMPANY_EMAIL, RECEIVE_COMPANY, RECEIVE_COMPANY_ADDRESS, RECEIVE_COMPANY_POST, RECEIVE_COMPANY_COUNTRY, RECEIVE_COMPANY_CONTACTOR, RECEIVE_COMPANY_PHONE, RECEIVE_COMPANY_EMAIL, FLOW_TYPE, IN_SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_WAREHOUSE_ID ) VALUES ( '{@#inNumber#}', '{@#charger#}', '{@#warehouseId#}', '{@#outTarget#}', '{@#shipCompany#}', '{@#shipType#}', '{@#shipNo#}', '{@#shipTracknumber#}', '{@#arrivalPort#}', '{@#shipDate#}', '{@#planArrivalDate#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#type#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#sendCompany#}', '{@#sendCompanyAddress#}', '{@#sendCompanyPost#}', '{@#sendCompanyCountry#}', '{@#sendCompanyContactor#}', '{@#sendCompanyPhone#}', '{@#sendCompanyEmail#}', '{@#receiveCompany#}', '{@#receiveCompanyAddress#}', '{@#receiveCompanyPost#}', '{@#receiveCompanyCountry#}', '{@#receiveCompanyContactor#}', '{@#receiveCompanyPhone#}', '{@#receiveCompanyEmail#}', '{@#flowType#}', '{@#inSourceType#}', '{@#sourceWarehouseId#}' )
delete from sc_warehouse_box where id = '{@#boxId#}'
select * from sc_warehouse_box where id = '{@#boxId#}'
delete from sc_warehouse_box_product where id = '{@#bpId#}'
select swbp.* from sc_warehouse_box_product swbp where swbp.box_id = '{@#boxId#}'

select swbp.*, (select srp.name from sc_real_product srp where srp.id = swbp.real_product_id ) as NAME, (select srp.real_sku from sc_real_product srp where srp.id = swbp.real_product_id ) as SKU from sc_warehouse_box_product swbp where swbp.id = '{@#boxProductId#}'
select * from sc_warehouse_box where in_id = '{@#inId#}'

select s1.* , s2.NAME , s2.REAL_SKU as SKU , s3.BOX_NUMBER ,s2.IMAGE_URL,s2.MEMO as P_MEMO from sc_warehouse_box_product s1, sc_real_product s2, sc_warehouse_box s3 where s1.box_id = '{@#boxId#}' and s3.id = s1.box_id and s1.real_product_id = s2.id
update sc_warehouse_box_product set waste_quantity = '{@#wasteQuantity#}' ,exception_memo='{@#exceptionMemo#}' ,gen_quantity = '{@#genQuantity#}' where id = '{@#id#}'
update sc_warehouse_box_product set status = '{@#status#}' ,waste_quantity = '{@#wasteQuantity#}' ,gen_quantity = '{@#genQuantity#}' {@ ,inventory_type = '#inventoryType#'} where id = '{@#id#}'
SELECT STATUS,COUNT(STATUS) AS C FROM sc_warehouse_in where type = 'in' GROUP BY status

SELECT s1.* , s2.NAME , s2.REAL_SKU as SKU , s2.IMAGE_URL ,s2.MEMO as P_MEMO ,s2.DECLARATION_NAME , s2.DECLARATION_PRICE , s2.WEIGHT*s1.QUANTITY AS WEIGHT FROM ( SELECT s1.REAL_PRODUCT_ID , s1.INVENTORY_TYPE, s1.MEMO, SUM(s1.quantity) AS QUANTITY, SUM(s1.gen_quantity) AS GEN_QUANTITY, SUM(s1.waste_quantity) AS WASTE_QUANTITY, (select warehouse_id from sc_warehouse_in where id = swb.in_id ) as WAREHOUSE_ID FROM sc_warehouse_box_product s1 , sc_warehouse_box swb WHERE swb.id = s1.box_id AND swb.in_id = '{@#inId#}' GROUP BY s1.real_product_id, s1.INVENTORY_TYPE ) s1, sc_real_product s2 WHERE s1.real_product_id = s2.id

select sc_warehouse_in_track.* , (SELECT s2.NAME FROM sc_user s2 WHERE s2.login_id = sc_warehouse_in_track.CREATOR) AS CREATOR_NAME from sc_warehouse_in_track where in_id = '{@#inId#}' order by create_time

INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_box ( IN_ID, BOX_NUMBER, SHIP_FEE, WEIGHT, LENGTH, WIDTH, HEIGHT, MEMO ) VALUES ( '{@#IN_ID#}', '{@#BOX_NUMBER#}', '{@#SHIP_FEE#}', '{@#WEIGHT#}', '{@#LENGTH#}', '{@#WIDTH#}', '{@#HEIGHT#}', '{@#MEMO#}' )

UPDATE sc_warehouse_box SET BOX_NUMBER = '{@#BOX_NUMBER#}' , SHIP_FEE = '{@#SHIP_FEE#}' , WEIGHT = '{@#WEIGHT#}' , LENGTH = '{@#LENGTH#}' , WIDTH = '{@#WIDTH#}' , HEIGHT = '{@#HEIGHT#}' , MEMO = '{@#MEMO#}'
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'

INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_box_product ( BOX_ID, REAL_PRODUCT_ID, QUANTITY, DELIVERY_TIME, PRODUCT_TRACKCODE, INVENTORY_TYPE, MEMO ) VALUES ( '{@#BOX_ID#}', '{@#REAL_PRODUCT_ID#}', '{@#QUANTITY#}', '{@#DELIVERY_TIME#}', '{@#PRODUCT_TRACKCODE#}', '{@#inventoryType#}', '{@#MEMO#}' )

update sc_warehouse_box_product set REAL_PRODUCT_ID ='{@#REAL_PRODUCT_ID#}', QUANTITY = '{@#QUANTITY#}', DELIVERY_TIME ='{@#DELIVERY_TIME#}', PRODUCT_TRACKCODE = '{@#PRODUCT_TRACKCODE#}', MEMO = '{@#MEMO#}', INVENTORY_TYPE ='{@#inventoryType#}' where ID = '{@#id#}' ;
INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_in_track ( IN_ID, STATUS, MEMO, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR ) VALUES ( '{@#IN_ID#}', '{@#STATUS#}', '{@#MEMO#}', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}' )
update sc_warehouse_in set status = '{@#status#}' where id='{@#inId#}'
update sc_warehouse_box_product set WASTE_QUANTITY = '{@#wasteQuantity#}', GEN_QUANTITY = '{@#genQuantity#}' where id='{@#bpId#}'

SELECT s1.* , (SELECT NAME FROM sc_warehouse s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.warehouse_id) AS WAREHOUSE_NAME, (SELECT IN_NUMBER FROM sc_warehouse_in s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.in_id) AS IN_NUMBER,
(SELECT DISK_NO FROM sc_warehouse_disk s2 WHERE s2.id = s1.disk_id) AS DISK_NO,
(SELECT s2.name FROM sc_user s2 WHERE s2.login_id = s1.creator) AS CREATOR_NAME, s2.NAME , s2.REAL_SKU AS SKU ,s2.IMAGE_URL,s2.MEMO AS P_MEMO FROM sc_warehouse_storage_details s1, sc_real_product s2 WHERE s1.real_product_id = '{@#realProductId#}' AND s1.real_product_id = s2.id ORDER BY s1.create_time desc
